message.body: What are your thoughts on going up to the indoor tomorrow?
I was just gonna text! I don't think I can, glad lucky is going though. I put cash from me & a check from Brenna in your trunk.
Thanks!!! Looks like the weather this weekend will be back to rideable but keep in mind the indoor during the week BC I'm game.
Since weather is going to be good - Sunday want to plan an outing?

Tanya might be a little stressy with holidays but we can ask. I can't go Saturday but Sam might be willing to go with you and Tanya would more likely agree to that. Maybe brenna would switch days with you.
Ok, let me check in with Tanya, but let's plan on going to the horse park Sunday either way?
